name: Airraid
overview: A shoot'em up game of "The Big 100" collection / part of "War Games" game pack. Originally published as Searchlight and was published in the book, "Winning Games on the Commodore 64", "Das große Commodore-64-Spiele-Buch" in German. Later it was published in Home Computing Weekly #052 (06.03.1984) by Argus Specialist Publications. In the game you move your searchlight to find an enemy bomber and destroy it, a brief flash while your target explodes may reveal other bombers hidden in the night's sky.
